${{ item.price }}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ItemService } from '../item.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-items', templateUrl: './items.component.html', styleUrls: ['./items.component.css'], }) export class ItemsComponent { items: any = []; constructor(private itemService: ItemService) {} ngOninit(): void { this.getItems(); } getItems(): void { this.itemService.getItems().subscribe((items) => (this.items = this.items)); } }
